"A.P.2028/x/xx": "Xiera, I'm coming in. ...I knew it. <%me>'s here as well."
"Oh, Sara. What's up? It's rare seeing you here."
"I heard that <%me> returned, so I came here to see for myself, while being called by Claris Claes."
"I heard that you got involved into another bothersome issue but, it seems like you're still full of life."
"Eh? You still haven't heard about it from Xiao?"
"I only received a note saying that <%me> had returned, no further details."
"His messages are becoming more negligent. What does he think a presenter's supposed to be? Maybe I should confront him and say that I'll postpone it."
"1. How's Xiao doing?"
"2. Xiao must've been lonely."
"That's my line. He's being holed up at the center of the Mother Ship, doing calculations as usual, so there's no need to worry, I guess."
"He also gave Xiera the authority to manage the whole ship, right?"
"Are you an idiot? He's probably used to it by now."
"Besides, he's too busy to think of this nonsense. Stupid Maria, she didn't have to force me to do all of her chores."
"By the way, are you free at the moment? I would like to ask some questions about the document that was submitted by the General Affairs Department."
"Ah- I don't know if I have spare time but- wait, just gimme a minute! It's a call from Xiao!"
"Jeez, Xiao! Why do you always call me out of the blue?!"
"Never mind- what's up? ...Nothing?! \"I always wanted to hear from you once in a while?\" You're an idiot, aren't you? Why don't you just finish your calculations and come out here?!"
"I'm doing fine at the moment. Yup, okay. Seems like things have settled on your side. I know that, I haven't been arguing or anything like that."
"Yes, okay, yup, got it. You don't need to call up day-by-day just to check. Besides, are you alright?"
"Well, it's not like I'm worried about you or anything. Anyways, I'm heading over there to visit, you'd better come out, or else!"
"I know, I know. See ya."
"Come on, he's always like this. Sorry Xiera, let's continue from where we left off-"
"Wait, what?!"
"Well~ I don't know how to put it... It's really nice to talk like that~"
"Hey, Xiera! Get back to the request! I'm sure there are problems with the document Maria gave us! Hurry up and show it to me!"
"Okay, okaaaay~"
"<%me>! Don't just stand there! Go back to your ARKS missions! Now!"
